Room.Name: Temple Passage
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Ulandian Temple, inside a gloomy secret passage.
Room.LongDescription: The passage is rather broad here due to a missing section of the wall. On the east side of the passage it looks like several stones have fallen and revealed a nest of hextrils. If you have never seen one before, you are quite lucky. They look like a land-dwelling octopus with a big head and mouth, and six strong tentacles. Luckily, their size is about like a small cat. Unluckily, they usually come in groups.
